forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A good deal of sunshine. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A good deal of sunshine. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
